subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Rangers Coach Alain Vigneault and his Canadiens counterpart, Michel Therrien, continued to trade jabs before Game 4 of a series featuring plenty of hard hits.
snippet: Rangers Coach Alain Vigneault and his Canadiens counterpart, Michel Therrien, continued to trade jabs before Game 4 of a series featuring plenty of hard hits.
